mapper.select: select id, hosp_code, visit_id, settle_id, payment_settle_id, visit_no, total_price, payment_price, pay_code, state_code, omsgid, oinfno, remark, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, settle_code, one_settle_id, red_id, old_settle_id, settle_time from payment_settle where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into payment_settle(hosp_code, visit_id, settle_id, payment_settle_id, visit_no, total_price, payment_price, pay_code, state_code, omsgid, oinfno, remark, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, settle_code, one_settle_id, red_id, old_settle_id, settle_time) values (#{hospCode}, #{visitId}, #{settleId}, #{paymentSettleId}, #{visitNo}, #{totalPrice}, #{paymentPrice}, #{payCode}, #{stateCode}, #{omsgid}, #{oinfno}, #{remark}, #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{crteTime}, #{settleCode}, #{oneSettleId}, #{redId}, #{oldSettleId}, #{settleTime})

insert into payment_settle(hosp_code, visit_id, settle_id, payment_settle_id, visit_no, total_price, payment_price, pay_code, state_code, omsgid, oinfno, remark, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, settle_code, one_settle_id, red_id, old_settle_id, settle_time) values
(#{entity.hospCode}, #{entity.visitId}, #{entity.settleId}, #{entity.paymentSettleId}, #{entity.visitNo}, #{entity.totalPrice}, #{entity.paymentPrice}, #{entity.payCode}, #{entity.stateCode}, #{entity.omsgid}, #{entity.oinfno}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.crteId}, #{entity.crteName}, #{entity.crteTime}, #{entity.settleCode}, #{entity.oneSettleId}, #{entity.redId}, #{entity.oldSettleId}, #{entity.settleTime})
mapper.update:
update payment_settle
hosp_code = #{hospCode},
visit_id = #{visitId},
settle_id = #{settleId},
payment_settle_id = #{paymentSettleId},
visit_no = #{visitNo},
total_price = #{totalPrice},
payment_price = #{paymentPrice},
pay_code = #{payCode},
state_code = #{stateCode},
omsgid = #{omsgid},
oinfno = #{oinfno},
remark = #{remark},
crte_id = #{crteId},
crte_name = #{crteName},
crte_time = #{crteTime},
settle_code = #{settleCode},
one_settle_id = #{oneSettleId},
red_id = #{redId},
old_settle_id = #{oldSettleId},
settle_time = #{settleTime},
where hosp_code =#{hospCode} and settle_id =#{settleId} and visit_id =#{visitId}
